sources.title: Rebellious Daughters
sources.description: Two rebellious young girls run away from home to find excitement in the big city, and run into trouble that they never expected.

sources.title: Rebellious Daughters (1938) EXPLOITATION
sources.description:
Stars: Marjorie Reynolds, Verna Hillie, Sheila Bromley 
 Director: Jean Yarbrough

 After a young girl moves out of her parents house against their wishes, she gets a job in a dress shop and gets mixed up with dirty pictures and blackmail!

metadata.Plot: Claire Elliott (Marjorie Reynolds) gets in trouble with her father (Oscar O'Shea) when she is accidentally involved in a fight outside a nightclub where he had forbidden her to go. Her friend "Babe" Webster (Verna Hillie) suggests that they go to New York City and take a modeling job offered them by dress designer Joe Gilman (George Douglas), who is actually a blackmailer using the dress business as a front for a call-girl racket.
metadata.Actors: Marjorie Reynolds, Verna Hillie, Sheila Bromley
